name: places/ChIJBewRKKH2wokRW-qMWiEoTyo
formattedAddress: 106 Pinehurst Ave #64-b, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 106 Pinehurst Ave #64-b, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: Robert is THE computer technician to go to in NYC! Truly has my business for life. My desktop computer completely stopped working out of the blue, and he was able to diagnose the problem the day of, find me an affordable used motherboard that he purchased on my behalf with my consent (he could have easily just purchased a brand new one and charged me full price for it), and got my desktop tuned up in no time, it works like new! His labor price was extremely fair. I felt communicated with every step of the way, and now I don't have to buy an expensive new laptop! DEFINITELY give this man your business, you won't regret it.

originalText.text: I am extremely happy and satisfied with the job that Robert did. My logic board for my MacBook pro was not working and he fixed it and made it brand new, he also charged me a fair price. Would highly recommend.

text.text: I am extremely happy and satisfied with the job that Robert did. My logic board for my MacBook pro was not working and he fixed it and made it brand new, he also charged me a fair price. Would highly recommend.

originalText.text: You know what I should’ve followed my gut feeling and I knew that the guy robert  was a complete jerk the way you picked up the phone. when I was at the studio the other day to inquire .now I come over here and  he waste my time coming all the way over here just to have a crazy no helpful attitude when I’m asking for a receipt and any place of business.,Will give you a receipt and an invoice towards what it is that’s going on I’m not doing no unsure business. No that’s why you got a business inside of your house because you don’t know how to do business seems a bit racial.does  he treat everyone like that I don’t know . But down he gos over a reciet I’m supposed to leave my laptop that’s worth thousands of dollars and I have no proof that I left it there. Are you kidding? I wouldn’t trust him .so I left

originalText.text: Robert is an extremely kind man who I feel very fortunate to have met! You can trust Robert to take the best care of you! He is excellent at fixing computers and is very trustworthy. All for a fair price. I feel extremely lucky to have met and worked with Robert!

text.text: Robert is an extremely kind man who I feel very fortunate to have met! You can trust Robert to take the best care of you! He is excellent at fixing computers and is very trustworthy. All for a fair price. I feel extremely lucky to have met and worked with Robert!

originalText.text: Robert is the nicest guy. He swapped out my screen for a fair price (and even donated the proceeds). He even told me that I'll likely need a battery replacement in a few months. If you want quality work done on your machine by a small independent business, this is the place for you. Best repair shop I have ever been to, and I've been to a lot! I will definitely be returning here for any future work I need, and will be recommending to my friends and classmates.
